description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 1/03/2006

Brooke tries to confront Taylor about her relationship with Hector, but Taylor defends that she has been faithful to Ridge. Felicia and Dante visit one another and share some champagne. Felicia tells Dante that she led a good life and Dante tries to probe her for more information about her life. Darla keeps encouraging Hector to pursue Taylor. He reveals to Darla that Brooke caught them together and that he has truly fallen in love with Taylor.
